name: Viridien Employee Engagement
description:
Motivating and Rewarding Sustainability in the Workplace with 'eCubed'

Our employee engagement programme assists companies wanting to promote a more sustainable culture. Combining latest technology and engaging communications, completely tailored and delivered by an account manager, enables a company to quickly and easily implement a fun, reward-based programme for employees to enjoy participating in.  Having sustainability as a core principle underpins a thriving, forward moving company.  

What’s the end result? A workforce that instinctively considers efficiency every day and a business that has an improved bottom line, either through an uplift in business demand or a decrease in operational costs.
